channel.title: Redash Installation with Oracle source on Linux
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
A summary of the issue and the browser/OS environment in which it occurs.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: * Browser/OS: Ubuntu 20.4 / Cent OS 7 or 8 * How did you install Redash: Followed https://redash.io/help/open-source/setup
Want to install redash 8 with oracle client 19, Any OS not matter. Kindly share the steps to complete the installation.
